page.title: 02GOVERNMENT DOWNLAND MINAL
page.content: The name Mildenhall, commonly MINAL,} is used in the title identification of this area as about 50% oof the land covered is in that parish. Ogbourne St. George parish (25% of area) lies along the northern border of Minal, except at the west end, where a strip of Ogbourne St. Andrew parish (5%) intrudes between them. In the east, Minal conjoins with Ramsbury(15%), and the northeast corner of the area lies in Aldbourne (5%), between Ramsbury and Ogbourne St. George parish boundaries.
